message: Processing complete! Your training module is ready.

steps.title: Initial Access
steps.description: Begin by inputting the 4-digit code on the screen. The order of entry doesn't matter.

steps.title: Troubleshooting Screen Lock
steps.description: If the screen locks up (numbers remain displayed, possibly due to incorrect entry or speed), repeatedly tap the screen until it goes blank with a red blink, indicating a reset.

steps.title: Reaccessing After Reset
steps.description: Once the screen is blank with the red blink, re-enter the 4-digit code to access the system.

steps.title: Confirmation
steps.description: Verify you have successfully accessed the system.
